Uses of Interface
net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.UiHandler

  • Packages that use UiHandler 
    Package Description
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.action
    Contains interfaces for plain UI handlers.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.event
    Contains interfaces for event related UI handlers.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.object
    Contains interfaces for object-related UI handlers.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.dynamic
    Contains the (base) implementations of dynamic effects.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget
    Contains the base implementation for widgets.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget.core
    Contains the base implementation for core widgets.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget.custom.field
    Contains the API for custom field widgets.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget.custom.pattern
    Contains the API for custom pattern widgets.

    • Uses of UiHandler in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.action

      Subinterfaces of UiHandler in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.action 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  UiHandlerAction
      This is the marker interface for a UiHandler of a specific action.
      interface  UiHandlerActionApply
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action apply.
      interface  UiHandlerActionApprove
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action approve.
      interface  UiHandlerActionCancel
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action cancel.
      interface  UiHandlerActionClose
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action close.
      interface  UiHandlerActionConfirm
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action confirm.
      interface  UiHandlerActionDelete
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action delete.
      interface  UiHandlerActionDown
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action down.
      interface  UiHandlerActionNext
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action next.
      interface  UiHandlerActionOpen
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action open.
      interface  UiHandlerActionPrevious
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action previous.
      interface  UiHandlerActionPreviousNext
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the combination of UiHandlerActionPrevious and UiHandlerActionNext.
      interface  UiHandlerActionRemove
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action remove.
      interface  UiHandlerActionSave
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action save.
      interface  UiHandlerActionStartEdit
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action start edit mode.
      interface  UiHandlerActionStopEdit
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action stop edit mode.

      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action submit.
      interface  UiHandlerActionUp
      This is the UiHandlerAction for the action up.

    • Uses of UiHandler in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.event

      Subinterfaces of UiHandler in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.event 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  UiHandlerEvent
      This is the interface for a UiHandler that represents an event listener.
      Classes in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.event that implement UiHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UiHandlerEventClick
      This is the UiHandlerEvent for the action UiHandlerEventClick.onClick(UiEventClick).
      class  UiHandlerEventClose
      This is the UiHandlerEvent for the action UiHandlerEventClose.onClose(UiEventClose).
      class  UiHandlerEventCollapse
      This is the UiHandlerEvent for the actions UiHandlerEventCollapse.onCollapse(UiEventCollapse) and UiHandlerEventCollapse.onCollapse(UiEventCollapse).
      class  UiHandlerEventFocus
      This is the UiHandlerEvent for the actions UiHandlerEventFocus.onFocusGain(UiEventFocusGain) and UiHandlerEventFocus.onFocusGain(UiEventFocusGain).
      class  UiHandlerEventIgnore
      An implementation of UiHandlerEvent that ignores all UiEvents.
      class  UiHandlerEventMode
      This is the UiHandlerEvent for the action UiHandlerEventMode.onModeChange(UiEventMode, UiMode).
      class  UiHandlerEventOpen
      This is the UiHandlerEvent for the action UiHandlerEventOpen.onOpen(UiEventOpen).
      class  UiHandlerEventSelection<VALUE>
      This is the UiHandlerEvent for the action UiHandlerEventSelection.onSelectionChange(UiEventSelectionChange).
      class  UiHandlerEventValueChange<VALUE>
      This is the UiHandlerEvent for the action UiHandlerEventValueChange.onValueChange(UiEventValueChange).

    • Uses of UiHandler in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.object

      Subinterfaces of UiHandler in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.object 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  UiHandlerObject<O>
      This is the marker interface for a UiHandler that offers a action that operates on a given object (the generic <O>).
      interface  UiHandlerObjectApprove<O>
      This is the UiHandlerObject for the action approve.
      interface  UiHandlerObjectDelete<O>
      This is the UiHandlerObject for the action delete.
      interface  UiHandlerObjectSave<O>
      This is the UiHandlerObject for the action save.

    • Uses of UiHandler in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.dynamic

      Classes in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.dynamic that implement UiHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UiHandlerEventModeVisibility
      This is the implementation of a UiHandlerEventMode that shows or hides a UiWidget if the UiMode is (not) editable.
